display_information.name: Askify
display_information.description: An internal Slack poll bot for team decisions, engagement, and feedback
display_information.long_description: Askify is a powerful internal Slack poll bot that makes team decisions, engagement, and feedback collection simple and effective. Create polls with 4 different types (single choice, multi-select, yes/no/maybe, rating scale), schedule them for future posting, set auto-close timers, enable anonymous voting, and get beautifully formatted results with emoji bar charts. Save poll templates for reuse, allow voters to add options, and automatically remind non-voters before polls close. Visit https://askify.jnahian.me for full documentation.
